title: Refine hero visual treatment and add extensible navigation hooks for the Secretary chatbot

requirements.text: Update the homepage hero background to use a real-life (photorealistic) image that clearly conveys community collaboration and efficiency, and ensure the hero section uses the updated asset.

quotes: Make sure the hero image is changed to a real life image that represents community collaboration and efficiency

acceptanceCriteria: Hero background image is a photorealistic real-life scene representing community collaboration and efficiency
Hero section loads the updated image from the static assets directory under frontend/public/assets/generated
Image remains responsive (object-cover) across mobile/desktop without obvious cropping issues that hide key subjects

requirements.text: Refine the hero overlay and overall hero tone so the hero image remains visibly recognizable while maintaining strong text readability (adjust gradient colors/opacities and/or add subtle image treatment if needed).

quotes: refine the hero image to be more visible with the overlay color

acceptanceCriteria: Hero image details are visibly discernible behind the overlay on common viewport sizes
Hero headline and subtext remain clearly readable over the image
Overlay remains a gradient (not a flat color) and is applied consistently across breakpoints

requirements.text: Apply the listed UI refinements across the hero and key interactive elements: hero headline contrast/pop, hero spacing/layout, and CTA button polish (hover, shadows, borders) while staying consistent with the existing style system.

quotes: List out would you like to refine in the hero image and tone and any other design elements.

acceptanceCriteria: Hero headline has improved visual separation from background (e.g., tuned shadow/contrast) without reducing readability
Spacing between headline, description, and CTAs is visually balanced on mobile and desktop
Primary/secondary hero buttons have consistent hover/focus styling and feel cohesive with the rest of the page

requirements.text: Refine the Secretary widget and related UI for readability and hierarchy: background/blur level, assistant/user bubble contrast, and typographic hierarchy (title, quick actions label, message text).

quotes: Secretary popup: adjust 50% black background, blur level, and bubble contrast.
Secretary text hierarchy: weights, spacing, and white/gray balance.

acceptanceCriteria: Secretary widget remains readable over both light and dark page areas
Assistant and user message bubbles have clearly distinguishable surfaces and consistent text contrast
Widget header, quick-actions label, and message text show clear hierarchy (size/weight/opacity)

requirements.text: Add an extensible navigation/deep-link hook system that current and future pages/features can register with, so the Secretary chatbot can direct the user to the correct page/feature when invoked (including from menu option selection and free-text routing).

quotes: incorporate hooks in current and future site pages and features so the chat bot secretary is able to direct to that page or feature when it is called upon

acceptanceCriteria: There is a clear, documented pattern (hook + registry) that pages/features can use to register a navigable destination/action for the Secretary
Existing Secretary option selection can trigger navigation/directing behavior using the new hook system (at minimum, one or more current actions demonstrate the mechanism end-to-end)

The system supports both (a) opening/toggling in-page sections (e.g., reveal an existing section) and (b) URL-based deep links (e.g., via query/hash parameters) without requiring edits to immutable hook files
A short developer note is added describing how to register new destinations for future pages/features

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor (no new backend services).
Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only shadcn components).
Do not modify immutable paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx.
All user-facing text must be in English.
nonGoals: Implementing a real AI/LLM-based Secretary (the Secretary remains a prototype navigation assistant).
Adding third-party authentication providers beyond Internet Identity.
Introducing new backend data models or persistence solely for chat routing.

edits: Improve photorealism/clarity and better convey collaboration + efficiency; adjust exposure/contrast for visibility (whisper-hero-community-real.dim_1600x900.png > whisper-hero-community-real-v2.dim_1600x900.png)
